job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Â Job Tittle:- Site Reliability EngineerJob Location:- Alpharetta, GA.Job Type: Long termÂ Contract Â Â Â Â Responsibilities: Â Â Â â¢ Run the production environment by monitoring availability and taking a holistic view of system health â¢ Manage platform infrastructure and applications â¢ Improve reliability, quality, and time-to-market of our suite of software solutions â¢ Measure and optimize system performance. â¢ Provide primary operational support and engineering for multiple large distributed software applicationsÂ Â Â Requirements: Â Â Â â¢ Deploy software artifacts to Development, QA, Integration, UAT, Staging, Load and Production environments â¢ Configure and troubleshoot software runtime environment, provide development support and Incident support â¢ Lead the rollout, enforcement and continuous improvement of team and enterprise standards â¢ Configuring Continuous Integration and/or Continuous Delivery pipelines â¢ Use continuous Integration tools: Jenkins, Sonar, Ant, Maven, Nexus, Rundeck, CHEF, Sonar â¢ Use of code repository tools like GIT â¢ Contribute to the design and implementation of our configuration management software architecture â¢ Design and implementation of tools to streamline SCM, Integration and QA processes â¢ Define, implement and champion policies to significantly increase the efficiency of our software development/delivery process â¢ Ensure Continuous Integration and Delivery through SDLC. Work with Development, QA and Operations to guarantee prompt, accurate, and repeatable delivery of the builds â¢ Provide up-to-date and accurate documentation on the SCM environment and Process Automation tools â¢ Work closely with Development and Quality Engineering teams â¢ Experience in one of the clouds (Azure/GCP/AWS). â¢ Experience in Java based application deployment on application servers like WebSphere and tomcat. â¢ Experience I vulnerability management and applying software patches â¢ UAT/Production deployments â¢ Experience with Agile practices Â§ Good team player and coordination skills â¢ Candidate should be a Green Card Holder or a US CitizenÂ Â RegardsÂ KajalÂ IT RecruiterÂ +1.307-316-7195 |Kajalsaini@noralogic.com|www.noralogic.comÂ NoralogicÂ | 109 E 17thÂ St, Cheyenne WY 82001Â USA: WY, MD, NJÂ Mexico: Guadalajara, MonterreyÂ India: Noida UPÂ **WBE and MBE company**Â ** ISO 9001:2015**Â **WY Top 50 Minority owned growing company**Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â
